requirement_tested: Frontend application with user-friendly interface for browsing and booking car rentals
user_persona: A first-time visitor looking to rent a car for an upcoming trip.
user_goal: To browse available cars and navigate to a car detail page.

narrative_steps.title: Landing on Homepage
narrative_steps.description: Sarah opens the car rental website and sees a grid of car listings with images and basic details. The background is papaya whip, and the cards have dark orange accents.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A responsive grid of car cards is displayed with make, model, year, category, and daily rate. Background is papaya whip.

narrative_steps.title: Browsing Car Listings
narrative_steps.description: Sarah hovers her mouse over a car card to preview more interaction feedback.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The card gains a shadow effect and the cursor turns into a pointer.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting a Car
narrative_steps.description: Interested in a specific car, Sarah clicks on the card to learn more.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The user is navigated to the car details page for the selected vehicle.

requirement_tested: Date and time selection interface for rental periods
user_persona: A user ready to specify rental dates for a selected car.
user_goal: To choose pickup and return dates and times for the rental period.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Date Pickers
narrative_steps.description: On the booking form, Mark wants to set his rental duration. He clicks on the 'Pickup Date' field.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Pickup Date' input field.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A calendar popup appears for selecting the pickup date.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Pickup Date
narrative_steps.description: Mark selects a date next week from the calendar.
narrative_steps.action: Select a date from the calendar popup.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The selected date populates the 'Pickup Date' field and the form validates that the return date is after the pickup.

narrative_steps.title: Setting Return Time
narrative_steps.description: Mark adjusts the return time by changing the hour in the time input.
narrative_steps.action: Change the value in the 'Return Time' input field.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The time updates and the form revalidates to ensure logical consistency between pickup and return.

requirement_tested: Car booking system with reservation confirmation
user_persona: A user who has filled out the booking form and is ready to submit.
user_goal: To finalize the booking and receive a confirmation.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Booking Request
narrative_steps.description: Anna reviews her selected dates and clicks the 'Book Now' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The system processes the booking and redirects to a confirmation screen.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Confirmation Details
narrative_steps.description: Anna sees her booking summary including car details, dates, and total cost.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A full-screen confirmation screen is displayed with booking ID, car info, dates, and total cost.

narrative_steps.title: Managing the Booking
narrative_steps.description: Curious about managing her booking, Anna clicks the 'Manage Booking' link.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Anna is redirected to the booking management section of her account.

requirement_tested: User authentication and account management system
user_persona: A new user wanting to create an account to manage bookings.
user_goal: To register for an account and log in.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating Registration
narrative_steps.description: James visits the homepage and decides to register. He clicks the 'Register' button which opens a modal.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A registration modal appears with fields for name, email, and password. Background is papaya whip.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Credentials
narrative_steps.description: James fills in his details. As he focuses on each input, the border highlights.
narrative_steps.action: Focus on each input field and enter valid registration details.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each focused input field's border turns dark orange.

narrative_steps.title: Completing Registration
narrative_steps.description: James submits his registration information.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The modal closes, and the UI updates to show James is logged in, with access to account features.

requirement_tested: Multiple payment method integration (credit card, PayPal, etc.)
user_persona: A user ready to pay for their car rental booking.
user_goal: To select a payment method and complete the transaction.

narrative_steps.title: Choosing Payment Method
narrative_steps.description: At checkout, Maria sees options for payment methods. She chooses 'Credit Card'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The credit card form fields appear dynamically within the checkout flow.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Payment
narrative_steps.description: Maria enters her card details and clicks 'Pay Now'.
narrative_steps.action: Fill in credit card details and click 'Pay Now'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The payment is processed, and the 'Pay Now' button is disabled until a response is received.

narrative_steps.title: Receiving Confirmation
narrative_steps.description: After successful payment, Maria is redirected to the booking confirmation page.
narrative_steps.action: Wait for redirect after payment processing.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Maria lands on the booking confirmation page indicating payment success.

requirement_tested: Order management dashboard for tracking reservations
user_persona: An administrator needing to view and manage bookings.
user_goal: To filter and cancel an active booking from the dashboard.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Dashboard
narrative_steps.description: Admin logs into the system and navigates to the order management dashboard.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the order management dashboard.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A tabbed interface with 'Active', 'Past', and 'Cancelled' tabs is displayed.

narrative_steps.title: Filtering Bookings
narrative_steps.description: Admin clicks on the 'Active' tab to see current reservations.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Only active bookings are shown in the list below.

narrative_steps.title: Cancelling a Booking
narrative_steps.description: Admin finds a booking to cancel and clicks the 'Cancel' button.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Cancel' button for a specific booking.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A DELETE request is sent, and the booking status updates immediately in the list.

requirement_tested: Responsive design with papaya whip background and dark orange components
user_persona: A mobile user accessing the platform on a smartphone.
user_goal: To use the platform seamlessly on a small screen device.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Site on Mobile
narrative_steps.description: Tom opens the car rental site on his phone and scrolls down to browse cars.
narrative_steps.action: Load the site on a mobile device and scroll.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The layout adjusts to a single-column grid, maintaining papaya whip background and dark orange accents. Scrolling is smooth.

narrative_steps.title: Interacting with Elements
narrative_steps.description: Tom taps on a car card to see details.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Navigation occurs to the car details page without misalignment or broken elements.
